title: Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam highlighting virtues that lead to inner strength
content:
Press Release:Press Information Bureau Prime Minister's Office Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam highlighting virtues that lead to inner strength प्रविष्टि तिथि:
                18 DEC 2025 9:19AM by PIB Delhi The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, shared a Sanskrit Subhashitam — “धर्मो यशो नयो दाक्ष्यम् मनोहारि सुभाषितम्। इत्यादिगुणरत्नानां संग्रहीनावसीदति॥” The Subhashitam conveys that a person who is dutiful, truthful, skilful and possesses pleasing manners can never feel saddened. The Prime Minister wrote on X; “धर्मो यशो नयो दाक्ष्यम् मनोहारि सुभाषितम्। इत्यादिगुणरत्नानां संग्रहीनावसीदति॥” धर्मो यशो नयो दाक्ष्यम् मनोहारि सुभाषितम्। इत्यादिगुणरत्नानां संग्रहीनावसीदति॥ pic.twitter.com/FQLHuPGJWw — Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) December 18, 2025 **** MJPS/ST (रिलीज़ आईडी: 2205664) आगंतुक पटल  : 23 Prime Minister's Office Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam highlighting virtues that lead to inner strength प्रविष्टि तिथि:
